column4: does anyone know why I get "configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables" when I try to compile my alsa sound driver?
ok...well i got passed that error, and now i have a new one...now i have these permission denied errors and i don't know why cause i used sudo
what was the command that was run?
make install needs to be run with sudo
i'm sorry...i did run it with sudo....but i'll try again
best to run each command separately (they are separated by ";" in that line) and see which one is producing the errors
also consider using checkinstall in place of 'make install'...
ok...i think it was the make command that was starting the problem...do you want to see a paste again?
i'll take a look, no promises though :)
ok http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36533/ it's ok if you don't get it....i really appreciate the help regardless
line 113 in that paste seems to be the nub of the issue, but I'm not sure what to do.  If no-one else here knows then perhaps do some Googling on the contents of that line
ok thanks.  I'll see what i can do
